item.title: Migrating to Fastlane (Part 1)
item.description: App releases, app distribution and general day-to-day development is full of laborious, manual tasks that squander our time. For iOS developers, Fastlane is an invaluable tool that can help automate away most of this. It’s fantastically easy to integrate into your workflow - that is, unless you find yourself with an app that has already seen multiple, manually-performed releases. I found myself in said situation recently, banging my head in frustration at the lack of documentation regarding this.
